reporting-org.narrative: Centre de recherches pour le développement international
Centro Internacional de Investigaciones para el Desarrollo

title.narrative: Digital Entrepreneurship and Development in the MENA Region: A Scoping Study
Entrepreneuriat numérique et développement dans la région du Moyen-Orient et de l'Afrique du Nord : une étude de délimitation de la portée

description.narrative:
Entrepreneurial activities are of paramount importance to the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) region. This grant will allow researchers to explore the connection between digital entrepreneurship, innovation, and development in the region.
Innovation, accelerators, incubators Recently, there has been growing interest by civil society, the private sector, and state actors to harness and use the innovation originating from university campuses. There has also been an interest in developing the role of accelerators and incubators. The idea is to create networks and hubs for entrepreneurial activities, specifically targeting information and communication technology (ICT) activities.
This grant will support a team of researchers from the American University in Cairo to survey and analyze the state of digital entrepreneurship in Egypt and other countries in the region. The research team will - study the factors that contribute to creating an enabling knowledge economy and environment for digital entrepreneurship in Egypt -develop a framework for assessing digital entrepreneurship in other MENA countries -survey digital entrepreneurship in Jordan, Lebanon, and Morocco -present the initial findings at an international conference -publish the final findings in a journal article
